items.content_html: Shadowizard is an open-source library for generating customizable box shadows using CSS. It allows developers to quickly and easily create visually appealing box shadows by providing a simple syntax for specifying the parameters of the shadow. With Shadowizard, developers can generate a wide variety of box shadows, including inset shadows.
items.title: nishantapps/shadowizard: Shadowizard  is an open-source library for generating customizable box shadows using CSS. It allows developers to quickly and easily create visually appealing box shadows by providing a simple syntax for specifying the parameters of the shadow.  With Shadowizard, developers can generate a wide variety of box shadows, including inset shadows.
